trans-unit.source: Provides the functionality that allows a common language runtime host to participate in the flow, or migration, of the execution context.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce la funzionalità che consente a un host di common language runtime di partecipare al flusso o la migrazione, del contesto di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.AppDomainManager> has a reference to a HostExecutionContextManager in its <xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A> property, then the common language runtime calls the manager every time a call to the <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method occurs, to allow the host to participate in the flow of the execution context.
trans-unit.target: Se corrente <xref:System.AppDomainManager>contiene un riferimento a un HostExecutionContextManager nel relativo <xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A>proprietà, quindi common language runtime chiama il gestore ogni volta che una chiamata al <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo si verifica, per consentire all'host di partecipare al flusso del contesto di esecuzione.</xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A> </xref:System.AppDomainManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Captures the host execution context from the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce il contesto di esecuzione host dal thread corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> is created using a safe handle containing the `IUnknown` pointer for the host executing the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>viene creato utilizzando un handle safe che contiene il `IUnknown` puntatore per l'host esegue il thread corrente.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"></xref> object representing the host execution context of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta il contesto di esecuzione di host del thread corrente.

trans-unit.source: Restores the host execution context to its prior state.
trans-unit.target: Ripristina il contesto di esecuzione host allo stato precedente.

trans-unit.source: `previousState` must be the object returned by the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `previousState`deve essere l'oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The previous context state to revert to.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato precedente del contesto da ripristinare.

trans-unit.source: previousState is .
trans-unit.target: previousStateis .

trans-unit.source: -or- previousState was not created on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - previousState non è stato creato nel thread corrente.

trans-unit.source: -or- previousState is not the last state for the .
trans-unit.target: - oppure - previousState non è l'ultimo stato per il .

trans-unit.source: Sets the current host execution context to the specified host execution context.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il contesto di esecuzione host corrente per il contesto di esecuzione host specificato.

trans-unit.source: The SetHostExecutionContext method sets the host execution context for the current <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SetHostExecutionContext imposta il contesto di esecuzione host per l'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> that has been used as the argument to another SetHostExecutionContext method call cannot be passed in as the parameter for this method.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>che è stato utilizzato come l'argomento di un'altra chiamata al metodo SetHostExecutionContext non può essere passato come parametro per questo metodo.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create a copy of a <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> object and then use the copy to set the host execution context.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare invece il <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo per creare una copia di un <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>dell'oggetto e quindi utilizzare la copia per impostare il contesto di esecuzione di host.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> </xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A> method using the object returned by this method to restore the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A>metodo usando l'oggetto restituito da questo metodo per ripristinare il <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>allo stato precedente.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> </xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"></xref> to be set.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"> </xref> da impostare.

trans-unit.source: An object for restoring the <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"></xref> to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto per il ripristino di <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"> </xref> allo stato precedente.

trans-unit.source: hostExecutionContext was not acquired through a capture operation.
trans-unit.target: hostExecutionContextnon è stato acquisito tramite un'operazione di acquisizione.

trans-unit.source: -or- hostExecutionContext has been the argument to a previous SetHostExecutionContext method call.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - hostExecutionContext è stato l'argomento di una precedente chiamata al metodo SetHostExecutionContext.
